org.rcsb.mbt.model.attributes
Class BondColorRegistry

java.lang.Object
  org.rcsb.mbt.model.attributes.BondColorRegistry

public class BondColorRegistry
extends java.lang.Object

A class used to register BondColor implementation objects. The names of the BondColor objects can be retrieved and used in a GUI menu in order for a user to pick the desired BondColor algorithm. The retrieved BondColor object may then be handed to a StructureStyle instance in order to assocate one or more Bond representations to a given coloring scheme.

Author:
John L. Moreland
See Also:
IBondColor, StructureStyles
